artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Ebisuya Shōshichi
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: two male figures in dark clothing against black background with oversize chrysanthemums in background; man at R is leaning on blue and red object, looking to UL toward man next to him, who proffers a sheet of paper decorated with blue designs
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Early Chrysanthemums
